post.body:
The New World Order,WHO,the military-industrial complex,pharmaceutical companies,strategic war zones and current martial laws give us a glimpse of a dark future that began with this fake pandemic, so if you are as dumb as I think you are and believe everything governments tell you, you are good for the slaughterhouse.

Covid-19 is one of the biggest massive frauds since the AIDS crisis, as is NASA and all this verbal crap of lies from our governments and you poor sheep that you are, you do nothing because you believe again and again that everything is going to be alright ...and trust these criminals in suits.

In these troubled and worrisome times of fear [ Fear kills and Denial a mask of this reality ] and paranoia about others who may be infected or contagious, the chances of success are not very optimistic and when I see certain government officials slowly depriving us of our fundamental rights and freedoms, it is clear to me that something has changed: I no longer recognize this world cradled by madness and absurdity.It's a battle beyond us. Few people really know the truth. Only insiders can understand the scope of the message and what the media meanstream [obviously under the control of the lobbyists] connects us with is only a decoy whose objective is quite different to serve their macabre purposes.They say that everything is going to be fine.Really?.You would trust a war criminal like the Director of the WHO and the UN [rear stronghold of the USA].You're serious...there..?.Do you have any idea what's coming?.You are handled like sheep.We have to fight this tyranny [ i mean the ruling oligarchies] that slowly creeps into our minds and "un-program" us.I know that my profile won't please many people, but it does indicate one thing: All of you, as much as you are,you wouldn't even be able to recognize the Devil in front of you.But I fear what awaits us is a war, a war between God and men.And when the Gods wage war on each other, it is men who die.Here is a small glimpse of what awaits us in the next few years: Massive vaccination,Rfid chips implanted,control and surveillance of individuals and there you will be able to say goodbye to your privacy and your money (digital currency),prevent people from appropriating land to dissuade them from being self-sufficient,world food shortage (2022-2024-source: UN), arms control,AI and therefore we will be at their mercy because they will have absolute control over our lives and of course,the inevitable war that is looming on the horizon but before they will starve the maximum number of people.You think I'm crazy and yet all this data is factual and verifiable.Once there,we will have to face another nightmare: Survival.

I invite you to watch this unique documentary film by Nik Nelson,very controversial and censored before its release in the USA,about the life and project of the film "Gray State -the end-" by American filmmaker David Crownley and gives a foretaste of what lies ahead [this man,along with his wife and children,were found dead in their living room and the official authorities report the incident as a suicide].According to the testimonies of relatives,the official version remains dubious.

And there are many such cases, but the official press never talks about them.

comment.body: @mxh69420: loll whether you are an idiot or a sheep or maybe you are incapable of common sense and judgment..Covid is a fraud because all the world economies are bankrupt and the global debt bubble will be impossible to repay..Everything will collapse ..and it will be chaos..Those who survive will be those who have food supplies and those who control that chaos..Believe me, it will be horror..and I advise you to prepare yourself for what will be a biblical end only God will save us and divine intervention to save us from the Darkness......
